entry.tran: (在别人危难时予以帮助的)撒马利亚人;助人为乐者
entry.def: You refer to someone as a Samaritan if they help you when you are in difficulty.

example.ex: A good Samaritan offered us a room in his house.
example.tran: 一个好心人让我们住在他家的一间房里。

means.word_mean: 1. a person who voluntarily offers help or sympathy in times of trouble

auth_sentence.content: You've been an incredible Good Samaritan to me.
